Package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.loader

Interface LoaderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
LoaderServiceImpl
public interface LoaderService
Provides an interface for interacting with loader elements in a UI automation framework, enabling checks for visibility and waiting mechanisms for when loaders appear or disappear. By referencing a LoaderComponentType and the DEFAULT_TYPE, implementations integrate seamlessly with broader test automation pipelines.

Classes implementing this interface typically rely on Selenium-based operations for synchronization, ensuring loaders are properly shown or removed within expected timeframes.

All methods are designed to support both container-based and locator-based identification of loader elements, offering a flexible approach to handle various UI designs.

Methods in this interface throw runtime exceptions if loaders do not appear or disappear within the specified time, allowing test flows to handle unexpected loading behavior.

Author:

  • Method Details

    • isVisible

      default boolean isVisible(SmartWebElement container)
      Checks if a loader is visible within the specified container using the default loader component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container to check for the presence of the loader.
      Returns:
      true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.

    • isVisible

      Parameters:
      componentType - The specific loader component type.
      container - The SmartWebElement container to check for the presence of the loader.
      Returns:
      true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.

    • isVisible

      default boolean isVisible(org.openqa.selenium.By loaderLocator)
      Checks if a loader is visible using the specified locator and the default loader component type.
      Parameters:
      loaderLocator - The By locator to check for the presence of the loader.
      Returns:
      true if the loader is visible, false otherwise.

    • waitToBeShown

      default void waitToBeShown(SmartWebElement container, int secondsShown)
      Waits for the loader to be shown within the specified container for the given duration, using the default loader component type.
      Parameters:
      container - The SmartWebElement container where the loader is expected to appear.
      secondsShown - The maximum time to wait for the loader to be shown, in seconds.
